segment: yaduktam - pañca skandhāḥ | pañcopādānaskandhāḥ | aṣṭādaśa dhātavaḥ |

parallels.parsegment: sarve ca dharmāḥ pañcadhā vikalpyante  pañca skandhāḥ dvādaśāyatanāni /    aṣṭādaśa dhātavo dvādaśa nidānāni dvāviṃśatirindriyāṇi iti |
16606 pañca skandhā dvādaśāyatanāni aṣṭādaśa dhātavo daśa kuśalāḥ
subhūtir āha katame bhagavan laukikāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ bhagavān āha pañca /    skandhā dvādaśāyatanāni aṣṭādaśa dhātavo daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāś catvāri
bhagavan sāsravā dharmāḥ bhagavān āha pañcaskandhā dvādaśāyatanāni /    aṣṭādaśa dhātavaś catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra
bhagavān āha: pañca skandhā dvādaśāyatanāny aṣṭādaśa dhātavo daśa kuśalāḥ
bhagavān āha: pañca skandhā dvādaśāyatanāny aṣṭādaśa dhātavaś catvāri
cakṣurvijñānadhāturyāvanmanovijñānadhātumanodhātuśca / /    evamatra pañca skandhā dvādaśāyatanāni aṣṭādaśa dhātavo nirddiṣṭā bhavaṇti
pañcaskandhā /    16804 dvādaśāyatanāni aṣṭādaśa dhātavaś catvāri dhyānāni catvāry
6     śūnyaḥ parabhāvaḥ parabhāvena śūnyaḥ tatra katamo bhāvaḥ bhāva /    ucyate pañca skandhāḥ tatra pañca skandhā bhāvena śūnyā ajātatvād | evaṃ
sarvaṃ sarvamiti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva pañca skandhāḥ, dvādaśāyatanāni, /    aṣṭādaśaḥ dhātavaḥ / iti /
nirviśeṣaṇaskandhaśabdaprayogātsāsravānāsravaskandhopādānam / pañcaiva skandhā na nyūnā adhikā vā
saṃskāropādānaskandhaḥ | vijñānopādānaskandhaḥ | ime bhikṣavaḥ /    pañcopādānaskandhāḥ ||
bhikṣavaḥ pañca skandhāḥ || /    (2) tatra bhikṣavaḥ katame pañcopādānaskandhāḥ? tadyathā -
(pṛ) yadbhavānāha  pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhasatyamiti | ke te pañca | (u)

parallels.parsegmenttext: Dasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, chapter 1 and 2 translated from the Tibetan
parallels.parsegment: pañcendriyāṇy, avyākṛtāḥ pañca skandhā, dvādaśāyatanāny, aṣṭādaśa dhātavo,
ucyate pañcopādānaskandhāḥ sa ca bhāvo bhāvena śūnyo 'kūṭasthāvināśitām
tatra katamā bhāvaśūnyatā? bhāva ucyate pañcopādānaskandhāḥ, sa ca bhāvo

bhagavān āha: pañca skandhā dvādaśāyatanāny aṣṭādaśa dhātavo daśa kuśalāḥ

parallels.parsegmenttext: Dasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, chapter 1 and 2 translated from the Tibetan
parallels.parsegment: dvādaśāyatanāny, aṣṭādaśa dhātavaś, catvāry āryasatyāni, dvādaśa /    pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni, catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāṇi,
taddhātutvam | /    atha kasmāddvādaśāyatanānyaṣṭādaśa ca dhātavaḥ pṛthaṅnirucyante ?
sarvaṃ sarvamiti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva pañca skandhāḥ, dvādaśāyatanāni, /    aṣṭādaśaḥ dhātavaḥ / iti /
dharmanairātmyamapi evaṃ bhavanīyam / dharma iti saṃkṣepataḥ pañcaskandho /    dvādaśāyatanam, aṣṭādaśadhātavaśca / tatra ye ca
kecit pañcaskandhān paśyanto mārgamadhigacchanti | kecit dvādaśāyatanāni /    vā aṣṭādaśadhātūn vā dvādaśanidānāni vā anyāni vā paśyanto
catvāri dhyānāni / catvāry āryasatyāni / pañcendriyāṇi / pañcabalāni /
ādhyātmikabāhyā dharmāḥ abhāvāḥ, catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni /    catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri
vimokṣamukhāni catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasraḥ /    ārūpyasamāpattayo 'ṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvasamāpattayo daśatathāgatabalāni
dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni: catasraḥ ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ catvāri

parallels.parsegmenttext: Dasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, chapter 1 and 2 translated from the Tibetan
parallels.parsegment: skandhā, dvādaśāyatanāny, aṣṭādaśa dhātavaś, catvari dhyānāni, catvāry /    apramāṇāni, catasra ārūpyasamāpattaya ete ucyante sāsravā dharmāḥ.

parallels.parsegmenttext: Dasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, chapter 1 and 2 translated from the Tibetan

evam adhyātmikā vā bāhyā dharmā abhāvaḥ? catvāri dhyānāni catvāry /    apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri
catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo 'ṣṭavimokṣā
catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaś catvāri

segment: catvāro brahmavihārāḥ | catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ | catasraḥ samādhibhāvanāḥ
